title: Nord-Pinus Tanger
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Moroccan, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A hotel restaurant offering Moroccan haute cuisine served in a traditionally-styled dining room with commanding views from the kasbah to the sea. Daily set menus, with vegetarian choices. Vegans should specify no dairy and no honey. Also has a bar on the terrace upstairs.
